participant_1.background:
My work life is boring, but I love my whiskey and Comic Con.
people do not like me too much but i like them anyways.
I think I should bake my grandson some chocolate cake for his birthday.
I am an only child and I am excited to start a new chapter in my life at college.
I love to play with my cat Mater when I have free time.

participant_2.background:
My family is supportive and understanding, even though they don't know about my love life.
i have 4 dogs.
I'm not really one for relationships, but my dog has been with me for 10 years.
I enjoy listening to the blues while wearing my hunter green suit.
I enjoy the creativity of Halloween and the joy of weddings.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I am doing well! I am excited to start my new chapter in college. What about you?
I am doing well! I am also excited to start a new chapter in my life, as I am moving to a new house.
That sounds exciting! I hope you enjoy your new house.
Thank you! I am sure I will. I have four dogs, so I need a lot of space.
Oh wow, four dogs! That must be a lot of work.
It is, but it is also a lot of fun. I love my dogs.
I can imagine! I have a cat named Mater, and I love him very much.
I love cats too! They are so cute and cuddly.
Yes, they are! Mater loves to play fetch and cuddle.
He is! I am so glad I have him.
I am glad you have a furry friend to keep you company.
Me too! He is the best
